climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: BREATHABLE COVER: The pillows' shell is made of breathable and skin-friendly microfiber fabric, provides a smooth and soft surface; Piping along the edge creates a neatly tailored look
SUPERIOR COMFORT: Down alternative fill for a comfortable plush feel, a great option for allergy sufferers. You'll fall asleep fast and wake up feeling fully recharged and ready to take on the day
Fluffy & Supportive: These set of 2 bed queen pillows are made with a great balance of supple softness and plump firmness, help to reduce neck pain and alleviate shoulder stiffness

No Shift Construction: Whether you're side sleepers, stomach sleepers or back sleepers - our cooling pillows for sleeping can accommodate! The plush bounce-back design will shape to your favorite position

DECRORATE YOUR BEDROOM: These ergonomic pillows are machine washable with tumble dry low. The Queen Size's dimension:45 x 70 cm. All product materials are carefully selected, strictly inspected and well made. If your sleeping experience with these pillows is not absolutely exceptional, simply contact us for full refund, we will spare no effort to help you solve problem!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MZOIMZO 2 Pack Luxury Down Alternative Breathable Bed Pillows Details: Material: Top-end Microfiber CoverHypoallergenic Bounce Back Loft FiberAll Sleep PositionsSet of 2Easy Care Machine WashableSuitable for All Seasons: Spring/ Summer/ Autumn/ Winter

Luxury Fabrics Cool cover to keep you refreshed. Soft, breathable and supportive design provides you with cool comfort while sleeping. Helps you wake up feeling refreshed instead of sweaty and overheated. Premium Microfiber-filled Filled with ultra-soft & firm down alternative, targets your head and neck to remove weight from sensitive pressure points that cause discomfort. fluffy and comfortable pillows bring you and your family a good night's sleep and a sweet dream! 4 Sizes for Choose You spend approximately one-third of your life sleeping so it is important to make sure you get yourself a set of these bounce back pillows. These medium density pillows are perfect for all sleep positions.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS Do I need to fluff the pillow? Yes, it's best to fluff your pillow often (daily, if possible) to keep it looking and feeling fresh. Our pillow's fill is specifically designed so that it can be revived and returned to its original puffiness with just a quick fluff. What's the best pillow for my sleep position? Our research shows nearly everyone shifts around during the night, so they designed a single pillow that could accommodate all sleep positions. Whether you like to sleep on your side, back, or stomach, you'll feel supported by the MZOIMZO pillow. Why Choose Between Soft and Supportive When You Could Have Both? MZOIMZO's pillow brings satisfy to all sleepers. The inner pillow is supportive, while the outer pillow adds a soft touch of fluff.

Taking Care of Your Pillows How to Clean: Wash with cold water(30°)Do not bleach or ironTumble dry on low heatAir dry in the sun How to Prepare: The pillows are packaged in a vacuum bag. For optimal use, please prepare as below: Open the package and remove the pillowsFluff the pillows vigorously and wait 24-48 hoursOnce fully loft(Fluffy Size: 45cm×70cm), use the pillows as desired

Our Comfortable Pillows Surrounds You in Luxurious Comfort Soft, breathable and supportive design provides you with cool comfort while sleeping. Helps you wake up feeling refreshed instead of sweaty and overheated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good soft but firm pillows
reviews.reviewText: The MZOIMZO Bed Pillows for Sleeping have exceeded my expectations in terms of both comfort and quality. The king size offers ample space, and the premium soft down alternative fill provides the perfect balance of support and plushness. The cooling feature adds a refreshing touch, making it ideal for a comfortable night's sleep. As a back sleeper, I find these pillows to be exceptionally supportive. The set of 2 ensures consistency, and the hotel-quality feel is evident. If you're searching for high-quality, cooling pillows that cater to various sleep positions, MZOIMZO Bed Pillows are a fantastic choice for a restful night's sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I feel they are of good quality.
reviews.reviewText: Well filled. Soft, supportive. Supports shoulders as well as head and neck. Should not go flat due to adaquate filling. Be sure to buy pillow cases if used for bed pillow. Good value. Would repurchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for shams
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are soft, fluffy and good for my shams. Too soft for my preference to sleep on but great for propping up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellently made and worth the cost...
reviews.reviewText: Nice and firm, comfy and no complaints

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, comfortable pillows
reviews.reviewText: Nice pillows for the price. Was a little disappointed they did not have more filling in them. For a standard pillow I would expect a thicker pillow that doesn’t flatten so much when in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No tan Cómodas como las king size
reviews.reviewText: Estas almohadas no son tan cómodas como las King size que compré anteriormente. Son planas, necesitan más volumen. Lamento no poder devolverlas porque la ordene para mi apto fuera de USA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, cool pillows!
reviews.reviewText: Love the price, cool to sleep on. Not too soft, not too stiff...perfect for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use for decor
reviews.reviewText: A bit on the soft side but I am using mine for my shams as a decor to match the bed spread. Good quality, I normally don't sleep with pillows but if I had to sleep with these I would need two to support my neck. I still recommend as the quality is very good.

reviews.reviewTitle: Soft pillow that offers no support
reviews.reviewText: Nice fluffy pillow that squishes down to less than half an inch when you head rests of it.Hence no support for the neck whatsoever.Good for stomach sleepers I would imagine but not for side or back sleeping.

reviews.reviewerName: Ma. de los Angeles Martínez Esquivel
reviews.reviewText: Me animé a comprar sin verla físicamente por la gran ventaja que hay de garantía de devolución si no estás satisfecho con el producto. Tengo almohadas justo como yo la buscaba. Ni muy alta ni muy dura, no pierde la forma. La recomiendo ampliamente.

Vienen en una bolsa súper ajustada, sacarlos de allí fué muy difícil, sin romper la bolsa, están empacados al alto vacío asi es que están muy planas, cuando las sacas ya de la bolsa individual, toman su forma.El largo es 5 cm más que una almohada individual. Son cómodas, término medio.

reviews.reviewerName: Muy práctico y bonito le gustó mucho a mi esposo
reviews.reviewText: Me gustaron mucho frescas, de muy buen material llenaron ampliamente mis expectativas
